title: ESA 3rd Sem AIML
content: Seeing the results, in which all subjects do you guys think they took relative grading?

comments.body: Ddco and dsa it seems. And webtech but that happens every year apparently

I had calculated my GPA based on the marks I was expecting, and I calculated a very close miss of a B grade in DSA, and I got C. I don't think we got relative for DSA but surprisingly, we got relative for EIE/CIE
I'm scared about the grading next sem it'll be scary if they do sem-2 grading
